description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A math flash card game for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.  Three difficulty settings and Local High Scores.  A good way for Dad to justify the XBox as an "Educational Tool".
description.short: A math flash card game for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.  Three difficulty settings and Local High Scores.  A good way for Dad to justify the XBox as an "Educational Tool".
